attributes.action: Help Stop Bullying. Put a full stop to bullying.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the United Kingdom, every year- It has been estimated by various children's charities and organisation that over 5000 people commit suicide- 
At least 16 children commit suicide because of bullying (the true total could be much higher)

Therefore, we urge you to intervene and put in place effective measures to tackle bullying and ensure the perpetrators are held accountable for their actions.
